definitions.definition: A drug smoked or ingested for euphoric effect, cannabis.
definitions.example: After smoking a bowl of that fine marijuana, they ate some brownies.

definitions.definition: The hemp plant itself, Cannabis sativa.
Food consumed before going to bed.
Any meal eaten in the evening; dinner eaten in the evening, rather than at noon.
A meal from a chip shop consisting of a deep-fried food with chips.
definitions.example: a fish supper; a pizza supper

definitions.definition: A drinker, especially one who drinks slowly (i.e., one who sups).
The tea plant (Camellia sinensis); a variety of this plant.
definitions.example: Darjeeling tea is grown in India.

definitions.definition: The dried leaves or buds of the tea plant; a variety of such leaves.
definitions.example: Go to the supermarket and buy some Darjeeling tea.

definitions.definition: The drink made by infusing these dried leaves or buds in hot water.
Any similar drink made by infusing parts of various other plants.
Meat stock served as a hot drink.
A cup or (East Asia) glass of any of these drinks, often with milk, sugar, lemon, and/or tapioca pearls.
A light midafternoon meal, typically but not necessarily including tea.
The break in play between the second and third sessions.
definitions.example: Australia were 490 for 7 at tea on the second day.
Spill the tea on that drama, hon.

definitions.definition: To take afternoon tea (the light meal).
A moment, a historical unit of time from China, about the amount of time needed to quickly drink a traditional cup of tea. It is now found in Chinese-language historical fiction.
